text: Serge Panine is a 1922 Austrian-French silent film directed by Maurice de Marsan and Charles Maudru and starring Albert von Kersten and Dora Kaiser.Goble p.351 It is based on the novel of the same title by Georges Ohnet. The film's sets were designed by Artur Berger. ==Cast== * Albert von Kersten as Serge Panine * Willy Hendrichs * François de Kerdec * Gyula Szőreghy * Paul Askonas * Dora Kaiser as Jeanne de Cerny * Violette Jyl as Micheline * Suzanne Munte as Madame Desvarennes * Franz Kammauf ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. title: Serge Panine (1922 film)
